title: India needs to explore incentives to improve renewables transmission capacity, power secretary says
description: India should consider a production-linked incentive scheme to enhance its renewable energy transmission capacity, says power secretary Pankaj Agarwal. Localizing the supply chain for transmission equipment is crucial, as global renewable energy waits to connect to the grid and current constraints exist in India's transmission capacity.
